title: The Naked Island (restored, colorized, dialogue free) (1960, Japan, drama, imdb score: 8.1)

sources.title: The Naked Island (restored, colorized, dialogue free) (1960, Japan, drama, imdb score: 8.1)
sources.description: The Naked Island ( Japanese :  裸の島 ,  romanized : Hadaka no Shima) is a Japanese  black-and-white  film from 1960, directed by  Kaneto Shindō . The film is notable for having almost no spoken dialogue.
